entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
